description: Main entry point for a Flutter application implementing a themed story feed interface, using Provider for state management and Material design components.

classes.name: AppRoot
classes.description: Root widget that sets up providers and theme for the app.

classes.name: StoryFeedProvider
classes.description: ChangeNotifier managing the state of the story feed, currently with a placeholder initialization flag.

classes.name: FeedScreen
classes.description: Placeholder screen widget displaying a styled message and a FAB for future story posting.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main function that initializes the Flutter app with AppRoot as the root widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for AppRoot, setting up Provider and MaterialApp with theme and home screen.

methods.name: markInitialized
methods.description: Method to set the provider as initialized and notify listeners.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for FeedScreen, constructing the UI layout with styling and interactions.
